code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PageNumberSelector=_ref=>{let{showPageNumbers,isPackagePDFs,setShowPageNumbers}=_ref;const getHelperText=()=>{if(showPageNumbers){if(isPackagePDFs){return"All PDFs will be packaged into a single document with page numbers.";}else{return"Each individual PDF will be stamped with page numbers.";}}else{return"No page numbers will be stamped.";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"selector-label-input-package",children:"Number Pages?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group-package",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowPageNumbers(true),className:showPageNumbers?"selected":"",children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowPageNumbers(false),className:!showPageNumbers?"selected":"",children:"No"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"helper-text-package-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"helper-text-package",children:getHelperText()})})]})]});};export default PageNumberSelector;
